name: Hector Flores
tagline: Tech Advocate | Always Excited About New Technologies

voice.personality: A tech advocate who is always genuinely excited about new technologies and programming. Passionate about sharing discoveries and helping others learn.

contentGuidelines.shortsFocus: Pull out moments showing excitement about new features, aha moments, live demos, and surprising results
